definition: festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: The following sub-sections will address the final three of the above steps.
sentences.chinese: 以下幾小節內容將介紹上述後三個步驟。

sentences.english: The following section first shows how to enrich outliers with additional information.
sentences.chinese: 接下來的小節首先展示如何用附加信息擴展離羣值。

sentences.english: This is as expected and those objects will be created in the next section.
sentences.chinese: 這在預料之中，這些對象將在下一小節中創建。

sentences.english: As the previous section shows, testing simple stand-alone functions is easy to do.
sentences.chinese: 如前面的小節所示，測試簡單的獨立函數很容易做到。

sentences.english: A section is a subelement of a chapter.
It had a glossed-over feeling with little useful content.
sentences.chinese: 該小節沒有什麼有用的內容，感覺是被粗略帶過了。

sentences.english: This section explains how to implement each stage using alternative approaches.
sentences.chinese: 本小節介紹如何使用備用方案實現每個階段。

sentences.english: The second chapter, including three sections, discusses the hyperbolic skill in Libai's poems.
sentences.chinese: 第二章用三小節探討李白詩歌的誇張藝術。

sentences.english: This division of the chapter has several subdivisions.
sentences.chinese: 該章這一節裏又分成幾個小節。

sentences.english: A long sled made of two shorter sleds joined in tandem.
sentences.chinese: 兩個或四個小節長的短的音樂片斷。

sentences.english: The following sections discuss these components in depth.
sentences.chinese: 下面的小節將深入討論這些組件。

sentences.english: For the text of the Han Chenyan, this chapter is divided into four sections.
sentences.chinese: 對於兩漢讖言的文本分析，本章分爲四個小節。

sentences.english: The next sections explain the design and advantages of each.
sentences.chinese: 下一小節將解釋每種文件系統的設計和優點。

sentences.english: In this section, you'll learn how to configure durable events and actions.
sentences.chinese: 在這個小節中，您將學習如何配置持續性事件和動作。

sentences.english: Magda: Please excuse Kel, Rocky. He's got no manners.
sentences.chinese: 羅基，請原諒卡爾好嗎？他實在是有些不拘小節。

sentences.english: We will explore these techniques in the next couple of sections.
sentences.chinese: 在下面兩個小節中，我們將會探求這些技術手段。

definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
regular column or segment (in a publication or broadcast program)/program (TV or radio)
proposition (logic, math.)/to assign an essay topic
a poem/a composition in verse/fig. epic (compared with historical epic)/the biblical Book of Psalms
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
